Directions: In a bowl, combine the cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and baking soda. Stir in the eggs, milk, oil and onion just until blended. Fold in the corn. Pour into a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish. Bake at 400 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Serve warm.
Ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans whole kernel corn, drained
